channel.title: Nomerciangame [V1]
channel.description:
Base i used for this: Devolution V6 Update's New home village [Cammelot] Fishing guild added + fishing spots and removed npc's (fishing guild is 90% like Runescape) Now working willow and magic trees Crafting [pick flax and now u can spin it in cammelot] If fixed that door I made my own version [Dungeon quest] First kill Dad in Cammelot and get red key, then go to a mine also located at Cammelot. And kill San-tojalon to get orrange key. Now teleport to Catherby there u need to find the Black-knight titan [located by a area where i added moss giant's] kill him and u can get awesome item's, also santojalon dropes awesome items. Ice queen added don't have added teleport to it but you can find it by the white wolf mountains in Catherby + dropes added on it. You see a fire giant by the Cammelot bank [Click on him and you become into barrows, kill the brothers and get the dropes! But i have only added verracs other barrow's npc is easy to add. Well i hope you can create a perfect economy on this server. And please say when u going to use it, then i going to have a look on your's. Well ive not leeched, only have used this base to add new area's to fix more doors and fixing bugs and clitche ****, ok thanks here u can download it: [url=http://uppit.com/NIYDNV]http://uppit.com/NIYDNV[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CN2JSNAL]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CN2JSNAL[/url]
Oh and ive added some new shops forgot to post here.
+ Picture's
[URL=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=bowarrowsshopls1.png][IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/8384/bowarrowsshopls1.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=chickencraftgy1.png][IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/746/chickencraftgy1.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=craftstoreke2.png][IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/2117/craftstoreke2.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=craftstringspl1.png][IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/1023/craftstringspl1.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=cuttreesmr1.png][IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/1633/cuttreesmr1.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img112.imageshack.us/my.php?image=dodiannomerciangameuy3.png][IMG]http://img112.imageshack.us/img112/820/dodiannomerciangameuy3.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=doorfixedwn1.png][IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/9527/doorfixedwn1.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=farmthiefbf3.png][IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/6267/farmthiefbf3.th.png[/img][/URL]
Female and male! [URL=http://img112.imageshack.us/my.php?image=femalemalecu0.png][IMG]http://img112.imageshack.us/img112/5593/femalemalecu0.th.png[/img][/URL]
[url=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fletchingvg8.png][img=http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/396/fletchingvg8.th.png]http://[/url]
[url=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fishworkshd9.png][img=http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/9950/fishworkshd9.th.png][/url]
[url=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fishingguildcu8.png][img=http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/6643/fishingguildcu8.th.png][/url] Npc from richscape client [url=http://img133.imageshack.us/my.php?image=generalyy8.png][img=http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/8030/generalyy8.th.png][/url]
[url=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=flaxpickwr1.png][img=http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/3046/flaxpickwr1.th.png][/url]
Don't have barrow picture, but you can find more things when u download my server, so try it out!
Also devolution source is in the download, so u can also but it again and then fully on your own, if do also some update's there but use my version it's lovely.
Here virus scan: [URL=http://img157.imageshack.us/my.php?image=virusscanig3.png][IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/2807/virusscanig3.th.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE="4"]REP ME PLEASE!!![COLOR="Red"][/COLOR][/SIZE]

Base i used for this: Devolution V6
Update’s
New home village [Cammelot]
Fishing guild added + fishing spots and removed npc’s (fishing guild is 90% like Runescape)
Now working willow and magic trees
Crafting [pick flax and now u can spin it in cammelot] If fixed that door
I made my own version [Dungeon quest]
First kill Dad in Cammelot and get red key, then go to a mine also located at Cammelot.
And kill San-tojalon to get orrange key. Now teleport to Catherby there u need to find the Black-knight titan [located by a area where i added moss giant’s] kill him and u can get awesome item’s, also santojalon dropes awesome items.
Ice queen added don’t have added teleport to it but you can find it by the white wolf mountains in Catherby + dropes added on it. You see a fire giant by the Cammelot bank
[Click on him and you become into barrows, kill the brothers and get the dropes!
But i have only added verracs other barrow’s npc is easy to add. Well i hope you can create a perfect economy on this server. And please say when u going to use it, then i going to have a look on your’s. Well ive not leeched, only have used this base to add new area’s to fix more
doors and fixing bugs and clitche ****, ok thanks here u can download it:

Oh and ive added some new shops forgot to post here.
